Key Match Events: Pete Alonso scored four runs in three at-bats, racked up three RBIs, and hit a crucial home run that kicked off a three-run rally in the first inning alongside Francisco Lindor and Brandon Nimmo.
Pre-Game Insights: Pete Alonso delivered a strong message to the Dodgers ahead of Game 6 and a potential Game 7.

Alonso stated, 'We’ve got to fight another day. We stood up to go out there because this is a game of opportunities, and they’re rare. We want to capitalize, survive Game 6, and see what we’ve got in Game 7—but we’ve got to get there first.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets triumphed 12-6 in Game 5, with Alonso playing a key role.
Game 6 will be held on October 20 at Dodger Stadium. If the Mets win, a decisive Game 7 will also be played in Los Angeles.
Others: Pete Alonso joined the FOX Sports broadcast alongside Alex Rodriguez, David Ortiz, and Derek Jeter.
Alonso joked that his travel bag is still packed and hadn't had time for laundry.
